name: Meruba
body:
### Immerse yourself in a non-stop addictive game that challenges your instincts and focus. Are you up for the challenge?

Version: 1.0 (alpha)

**Meruba was founded and designed by David Bar-Aharon and developed by Joseph Gitarts.**  
David Bar-Aharon (@u16dbaraharon) u16dbaraharon@wbais.net  
Joseph Gitarts (@JosephIan)u16jgitarts@wbais.net
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
